text: Anyway to update fields.json without cli?
There are some attributes that can only be accessed from fields.json — but  you can just use design tools to get at most of it.
Could I create a new json file and manualy upload it in designer to the the,e folder and then delete the old one?

You could but you would need to use the CLI to do it all. You wont be able to upload it directly from DM.

What are you trying to do?
Haha I know you think the CLI is a bit clunky and OG but it’s really not that hard to use. I can walk you through it if you need.
Also the docs on the HS dev site for the CLI are pretty solid too
I build 16 column css grid modules in a full width section.
